name: commit-commands
description: Simplifies common git operations with streamlined commands for committing, pushing, and creating pull requests
author: Anthropic

commands.name: commit
commands.description: Create a git commit with appropriate message

commands.name: commit-push-pr
commands.description: Commit, push, and create a PR in one command

commands.name: clean_gone
commands.description: Clean up stale local branches marked as [gone]
